sub_topic: Predicting the solubility of inorganic salts in water
message_1: What is the solubility of Calcium Nitrate in 100 mL of water at 25 °C?
message_2: The solubility of calcium nitrate (Ca(NO₃)₂) in water at 25 °C is approximately 121.2 g per 100 mL of water. This means that at 25 °C, you can dissolve 121.2 grams of calcium nitrate in 100 mL of water before it becomes saturated.
